title.narrative: Sino-Danish Offshore Wind Cooperation ("Quality Offshore Wind"), Phase 2

description.narrative:
The Strategic Sector Cooperation on off-shore wind aims to mitigate climate change while fostering technological development and sustainable economic growth by supporting a green transition in the Chinese power sector through:
-A strengthened regulatory framework for offshore wind development, including spatial planning, de-risking processes and efficient tendering procedures that leads to clear pathways for China. -Strengthened provinces in best practice in tendering a full-scale offshore wind farm -Improved capacity within institutions tasked to regulate certification and standards for offshore wind components -Improved capability in enhancing performance of selected operating offshore wind farms in China -Strengthened Chinese developers regarding site allocation and investment environment.

title.narrative: Not applicable as baseline, impact indicators are not defined for current SSC projects.
